casebody.data:
PLASMAN
v.
DECCA FURNITURE (USA), INC., et al. 127P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 15, 2017 Matthew K. Rogers, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Plasman, Christian G. Robert A. Muckenfuss, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Andrew D. Atkins, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Jodie H. Lawson, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Decca Furniture (USA), Inc., et al.

Robert A. Muckenfuss, Attorney at Law, Charlotte.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of May 2017 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to Respond to Motion to Dismiss Portions of Petition for Discretionary Review That Are Untimely:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of May 2017."

*54Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 25th day of May 2017 to Respond to Petition for Discretionary Review.
